Text:
Portable products are not listed on manufacturer's sites, they are made. To run in a pre-designed, pre-loaded environment handler.  

None of the portable versions available in the wild are developed by the "manufaturer" or developer.

Hope that clarifies.

Regards
SG

the portable is designed for your usb key drive

I use it to work on a 3D render project at home, and show off my work without bringing any of the data and scripting algorythms to get stolen at the tradeshows. All I need to bring is a simple laptop with wifi internet access.

it's smaller because all the extra language libraries are stripped.
